duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop a robust calibration program for laboratory equipment
Perform calibrations and repairs at customer sites
Empower lab personnel to expand their calibration skills and develop lean processes
Optimize calibration disciplines to provide innovative services and set industry standards
Interact directly with customers to fulfill their calibration needs
Take corrective action on nonconforming customer issues and work with Sales to create offerings to meet customer needs
Manage Laboratory P & L to achieve revenue, cost, and profit goals
Develop 1, 3, 5 year plans to scale business and address workforce planning, equipment utilization, and laboratory footprint
Provide management and supervisory responsibility for the day-to-day activities of a Calibration Laboratory

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree (B.A.) from a four-year college or university preferred
